name: The Snooze
description:
!!UPDATE!!

We managed to get the web version working. Try it! We also added two minor features we couldn't implement before as they were crashing the game. :)))

Delay the inevitable morning getting up. Turn off all alarm clocks and try to sleep as long as you can.

controls : 

                      W/S - eyes opening/closing

                      SPACE BAR  - smash

                      ARROWS  - movement

Have fun!

@atelier_notfound
